Package com.example.lotto649.Controllers

Class EventController

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotto649.AbstractClasses.AbstractController
com.example.lotto649.Controllers.EventController
public class EventController extends AbstractController
Controller class for managing an EventModel instance. Provides methods to update event properties and save/remove events from Firestore.

Outstanding Issue: This controller should not be reused between different fragments

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    EventController(EventModel event)
    Constructs an EventController for the specified EventModel.
